src_original: tathā ca punar atrâivam āha /  sūsukhitāḥ sada te naraloke yeṣu priyâpriya nâsti kahiṃcit /
tgt_original: 於其世間恒受樂，　　謂愛無愛不貪著，

src_original: ye ca na kandarake 'bhiramante śrāmaṇakaṃ susukhaṃ anubhonti //
tgt_original: 常能愛樂於山林，　　恒受如此沙門樂。

src_original: yeṣu mamâpi tu nâsti kahiṃcit /  yeṣu parigrahu sarvaśu nâsti /
tgt_original: 若人無有諸取著，　　遠離一切諸我所，

src_original: khaḍgasamā vicaranti mu lokaṃ gagane pavana yathêva vrajanti //
tgt_original: 遊行世間猶犀牛，　　如風行空無障礙。

src_original: syuḥ sukhitā vata te naraloke yeṣu na sajjati mānasa loke /
tgt_original: 此人恒受於快樂，　　其心不著於世間，
